post.title: Holy Jet Lag
post.author: Jackson Hayes
post.content:
I am exhusted, I forgot to eat, my body hates me. Running on about 6 hours of sleep in 48 hours. So basically I am running on pure will power. I just need to stay awake for maybe two more hours and I will be fine for tomorrow. 

I really am really not keen on the area that I am staying in, Tsim Sha Tsui. It is just a giant assortment of high end designer shops and other random shopping. I didn't fly half way across the world to go to a shopping mall or to see a Starbucks next to a McDonalds. 

Get me to the mainland or give me a new perspective, or to put it another way, get me some sleep or get me on a sleeper train.
